document.title: Hello World - Welcome to Our Blog
document.description: Welcome to our blog! This first post demonstrates all the features of our MDX-powered blogging system.

body.raw:
# Hello World - Welcome to Our Blog

Welcome to our blog! This is our first post, and we're excited to share our thoughts and insights with you.

![A beautiful black cat](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1503431128871-cd250803fa41?fm=jpg&q=60&w=3000&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8YmxhY2slMjBjYXR8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D)

## What You'll Find Here

Our blog features a modern, responsive design with powerful content capabilities:

<Alert type="info">
This blog supports rich content with custom React components, syntax highlighting, and more!
</Alert>

## Code Examples

Here's a simple JavaScript example with syntax highlighting:

```javascript
function greetVisitor(name) {
  const message = `Hello, ${name}! Welcome to our blog.`
  console.log(message)
  return message
}

// Usage
greetVisitor("World")
```

And here's some Python:

```python
def greet_visitor(name):
    message = f"Hello, {name}! Welcome to our blog."
    print(message)
    return message

# Usage
greet_visitor("World")
```

## Custom Components

We support custom React components in our content:

<Callout emoji="ðŸš€">
This is a custom callout component that makes important information stand out!
</Callout>

<Alert type="success">
Success alerts work great for highlighting achievements or completed tasks.
</Alert>

<Alert type="warning">
Warning alerts help draw attention to important considerations.
</Alert>

## Features Overview

Our blog includes:

1. **Responsive Design** - Works perfectly on all devices
2. **Dark/Light Mode** - Toggle between themes
3. **Syntax Highlighting** - Beautiful code blocks with copy functionality
4. **Reading Time** - Estimated reading time for each post
5. **Word Count** - Track article length
6. **Tags** - Organize content by topics
7. **Share Functionality** - Easy sharing with native Web Share API
8. **MDX Support** - Rich content with React components

## Getting Started

To read more articles, simply navigate to our [blog index](/blog) or explore posts by tags. Each post includes reading time estimates and word counts to help you plan your reading.

<CodeBlock title="Sample Configuration" language="bash">
npm install
npm run dev
npm run build
</CodeBlock>

---

Thanks for visiting our blog! We hope you enjoy the content and find it useful. Stay tuned for more posts covering development, technology, and insights from our team.
